item.title: Switching Sound Resources by Script in Godot3
item.description: This article explains how to switch between and play multiple sound resources (music and sound effect files) with a single “AudioStreamPlayer” node. Basically, only one sound resource can be set per “AudioStreamPlayer” node. In other words, you must add “AudioStreamPlayer” nodes in the scene tree for each sound resource.
